explains: v. 报复，反击；<古>就（伤害，侮辱）进行报复

sentences.en: I was sorely tempted to retaliate.
It takes the most levelheaded and good-tempered of drivers to resist the temptation to retaliate when subjected to uncivilized behavior.
sentences.cn: 只有头脑最冷静、脾气最好的司机，才能在遇到不文明行为时抵制报复的诱惑。

sentences.en: He had authorization from the military command to retaliate.
sentences.cn: 他得到了军事指挥部进行还击的授权。
